actions.text: On agreeing to the Riggs amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 212 (Roll No. 349).

description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to implement certain antidiscrimination provisions contained in the Administrative Code of San Francisco, CA.
purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit any funds to be used to implement section 12B.2(b) of the Administrative Code of San Francisco, California.
